sentence: On the rest of the menu, Ron DeSantis is waging an all-out war on Florida residents' civil rights; sixteen states are suing the United States Postal Service to halt the purchases of thousands of Louis DeJoys gas-guzzling? mail trucks; and, California subpoenaed ExxonMobil as part of a first-of-its-kind broader investigation into the petroleum industry for its role in causing a global plastic pollution crisis.
title: West Coast Cookbook & Speakeasy Daily Special, Blue Moon Spirits Fridays
